      • getDefaultValue

        public com.mongodb.ReadPreference getDefaultValue(ConfigurationPropertyReader propertyReader)
        Description copied from class: Option
        May be overridden by specific option types to retrieve a default value based on the configuration properties used to bootstrap Hibernate OGM.
        Overrides:
        getDefaultValue in class Option<Object,com.mongodb.ReadPreference>
        Parameters:
        propertyReader - Provides access to the configuration properties used to bootstrap Hibernate OGM, e.g. given in persistence.xml or set on OgmConfiguration.
        Returns:
        A default value for a specific option type or null if no default exists.
